traits.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The tasloi can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Javelin Expert
entries: Tasloi can use their Dexterity score for attack and damage rolls with a javelin, just as if the javelin had the finesse property.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Net
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. The target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a DC 10 Strength check to free itself or another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
